content: स्थित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [स्था-क्त] {@--1@} Stood, remained, stayed. {@--2@} Standing. {@--3@} Standing up, risen; स्थितः स्थितामुच्चलितः प्रयातां… छायेव तां भूपतिरन्वगच्छत् <ls>R. 2. 6.</ls> {@--4@} Staying, resting, living, being, existing, situated; धन्या केयं स्थिता ते शिरसि <ls>Mu. 1. 1</ls>; <ls>Me. 7</ls>; <ab>oft.</ab> with gerunds merely as a copula; <ls>V. 1. 1</ls>; <ls>Ś. 1. 1</ls>, <ls>Ku. 1. 1.</ls> {@--5@} Happened, occurred; <ls>Ku. 4. 27.</ls> {@--6@} Stationed in, occupying, appointed to; <ls>Ś. 4. 18.</ls> {@--7@} Acting up to, abiding by, conforming to; <ls>R. 5. 33</ls>; धर्मे स्थिताः (राजानः) <ls>Māl. 10. 25.</ls> {@--8@} Stood still, stopped, desisted. {@--9@} Fixed on, firmly attached to; <ls>Ku. 5. 82.</ls> {@--10@} Steady, firm; as in स्थितधी or स्थितप्रज्ञ <ab>q. v.</ab> {@--11@} Determined, resolved; <ls>Ku. 4. 39.</ls> {@--12@} Established, decreed. {@--13@} Steadfast in conduct, steady-minded. {@--14@} Upright, virtuous. {@--15@} Faithful to a promise or agreement. {@--16@} Agreed, engaged, contracted. {@--17@} Ready, being close or at hand. --तं A word standing by itself.
